mcq.statement: Which of the following is correct about the structure of brain? Cerebral medulla is outer part consists of white matter, Cerebral cortex is outer part consists of grey matter, Cerebral medulla is inner part consists of grey matter, Cerebral cortex is inner part consists of white matter

options.a: Cerebral medulla is outer part consists of white matter
options.b: Cerebral cortex is outer part consists of grey matter
options.c: Cerebral medulla is inner part consists of grey matter
options.d: Cerebral cortex is inner part consists of white matter
